title: Bhavish Aggarwal teases Ola bike: Will it launch this August 15?
description: Ola CEO Bhavish Aggarwal teased an image of the battery pack for the company's upcoming electric motorcycle models: Diamondhead, Adventure, Roadster, and Cruiser. These models, each catering to different riding preferences, were initially showcased last August with a promise to launch by late 2024. Speculations suggest an announcement might occur on August 15.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
